web-development.name: Web Development
web-development.description: Professional web development services including frontend, backend, and full-stack solutions. Our developers create responsive, scalable websites and web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and cloud platforms.
web-development.detailedDescription: From simple landing pages to complex enterprise applications, our web developers deliver high-quality solutions. We specialize in e-commerce platforms, SaaS products, CMS development, and custom web applications with focus on performance, security, and user experience.

ui-ux-design.name: UI/UX Design
ui-ux-design.description: User interface and experience design services for web and mobile applications. Our designers create intuitive, visually appealing interfaces that enhance user engagement and drive conversions.
ui-ux-design.detailedDescription: We follow a user-centered design process from research to final implementation. Our services include user research, wireframing, prototyping, visual design, and design system creation for consistent brand experiences across all platforms.

mobile-development.name: Mobile Development
mobile-development.description: Native and cross-platform mobile app development for iOS and Android. We build high-performance mobile applications with excellent user experiences.
mobile-development.detailedDescription: Specializing in both native (Swift/Kotlin) and cross-platform (React Native/Flutter) development. Our mobile developers create everything from simple utility apps to complex enterprise solutions with features like push notifications, payment integration, and offline functionality.

digital-marketing.name: Digital Marketing
digital-marketing.description: Comprehensive digital marketing strategies including SEO, social media marketing, PPC campaigns, and content marketing to grow your online presence.
digital-marketing.detailedDescription: Data-driven marketing strategies that deliver measurable results. We optimize campaigns for maximum ROI across search engines, social media platforms, and email marketing channels with continuous A/B testing and performance analysis.

content-writing.name: Content Writing
content-writing.description: High-quality content creation for websites, blogs, marketing materials, and technical documentation that engages audiences and drives conversions.
content-writing.detailedDescription: Professional writing services tailored to your brand voice and target audience. We create SEO-optimized content that ranks well on search engines while maintaining readability and engagement for your readers.

graphic-design.name: Graphic Design
graphic-design.description: Creative graphic design services including logo design, branding, marketing materials, and visual identity solutions.
graphic-design.detailedDescription: Professional design services that communicate your brand message effectively. From logo design to complete brand identity systems, we create visually compelling designs that stand out in competitive markets.

video-editing.name: Video Editing
video-editing.description: Professional video editing services for social media, advertisements, corporate videos, and creative content.
video-editing.detailedDescription: High-quality video editing that tells compelling stories. We transform raw footage into engaging videos with professional color grading, sound design, motion graphics, and effects for various platforms and purposes.

seo-services.name: SEO Services
seo-services.description: Search engine optimization services to improve organic search rankings, increase website traffic, and boost online visibility.
seo-services.detailedDescription: Comprehensive SEO strategies including technical SEO, on-page optimization, content strategy, and link building. We conduct thorough audits and implement data-driven optimizations to improve search rankings and organic traffic.
